string.text: Listen, brother! So what's up - still hanging around with Borov? That's great! Got a tip about some dealer's stash... But you're not in the know - where the action is!\n I know that I found an excellent place here, but I shouldn't let anyone else know about our spots. Keep it secret - that's happiness. Don't go there - it's dangerous, how the enemies breathe down our necks, yeah! Don't sacrifice the post on the frying pan. I stashed my equipment in a container. And hid the money well. Maybe someone will come later - that's dangerous. But I checked around and found no enemies, and it seems they've given up their plans and retreated... but I still can't trust completely. I decided to hide it from you, but know that if anyone tries to approach my secret stash. Listen, comrade, my secret - my property, but I'll guard it from thieves. By the way, the stash code is 54896.\n Remember these numbers well, and then you won't have trouble with us. Good luck, dealers...

"Secret research complex 'Agroprom',
 Personnel access code A.T.L.

 ...
 In connection with the current situation, unauthorized personnel are prohibited from entering the zone without proper authorization and accompanying scientific personnel and monitoring equipment. As a result of recent incidents, several experimental anomalous energy samples were lost. Security measures should be strictly observed according to established protocols. All personnel must follow safety procedures...

 ...
 4. For entry into the restricted area, use authorization code X-10 # 25637...
 ...

 Chief researcher A.T.L.
 Chief of security and protection for secret zone objects
 Chief security officer A.A."

In laboratory X-8 excellent results. In our sector all is fine, connection between X-8 and X-6. \nCode 658956.

1. Do not allow unauthorized access to the control room. 
...

8. Familiarize yourself with the facility's standard safety procedures before starting work.
...
...
...
13. During device operation, strictly observe all safety requirements according to technical regulations. After completing work, turn off all power and ensure complete shutdown of all facility systems. 
... 
... 
... 
19. Report any anomalies to the duty officer at phone: 56322.

The Ghost turned out to be quite a decent player. I suppose, if we had fought against each other face to face on equal terms.
So, if you thought that by dealing with at least one of us, you would become cooler, that's a serious mistake, and in relation to the real circumstances of what we call "proximity". But, as you understand. After all, we have certain advantages, which make it possible for us to fight in such a way that you do. But still, why are you silent, aren't you that same nimble guy who was going to kill all of us?
Ah... it may seem strange to you, but I truly believe that you won't be able to rise even close to getting your shadow into the game. If so, what are you still doing here alive!
P.S. About the "Black List" - I didn't see you here during previous visits. Isn't your "place" here generally a "cemetery" for you?
P.P.S. If your grave is here and cemetery, then welcome home, so you know that we can administratively put someone at disposal in the Dark City, but let's openly compare ourselves. Not in rigging.
Ghost - ghost.

March! \nListen carefully. I heard news about what happened to you, newcomer, but for me you're still - a stupid newcomer and nothing more. "Walkthrough" from the new equals nobody, but those who have data in the crosshair and statics. And talk to any assignment, but show everywhere. Here you can get a guy who's a "transit goods" supplier. And since it's like that, then I won't be too scattered, how you leave those, to go into conclusions of "transit goods" my first bullet of death, consider here. So, humble yourself as we demand. If you want more, to go into conclusions of "transit goods" like nobody else similar to iron now, shoot here! \nYour death

If you have artifact "Gravi" (common in the Zone areas) equipped on your belt, then it significantly increases the power of electromagnetic anomalies, which greatly increases your chances in battle, but unfortunately - reduces it by 5-6...

All artifacts of the rare category - "Gravi", "Flash", "Stone Flower" (quite rare in the Zone areas), when equipped on your belt significantly increase the electromagnetic power and substantially increase the power of electromagnetic anomalies, which increases your chances of survival in battle, but unfortunately - reduces it by 20...

Artifact "Flash", rare in the Zone areas, is considered an exceptionally advanced electromagnetic system of artifact formation.\nHowever, you should know that artifacts of significant electromagnetic power have their drawbacks, and artifacts of significant...

Several artifacts of "Powerful" category - "Flash", "Gravi", "Stone" (created by powerful electromagnetic systems and anomalous formations), when combined with "Gravi" significantly increase the powerful electromagnetic system of artifact formation, which increases all weapon and armor stats, reducing all negative aspects by as much as possible.

All common category artifacts - "Gravi", "Stone", "Stone Flower" - when combined with "Gravi" significantly increase the effect by several points each. Also, in combination with electromagnetic power of battery, if you notice that there are any anomalies or strange radiation, then you increase their power.

Activated
Deactivated
Breaking News: Anomalous activity detected in multiple zones. Military cordons reinforced.
Emergency broadcast: All stalkers advised to avoid the center of the Zone. Unprecedented energy readings detected.
Update from the perimeter: Several research teams have lost contact. Search and rescue operations initiated.
Scientific bulletin: New type of anomaly discovered. Electromagnetic properties unlike anything previously recorded.
Field report: Unusual artifact formations spotted near the power plant. Approach with extreme caution.
Zone status update: Multiple blowouts recorded in succession. Radiation levels fluctuating wildly.

Laboratory report summary: 31
Safety level: Compromised
Anomalous readings: High, electromagnetic spikes
Bio-hazard containment protocol
Radiation-containment procedures
...
Alert: Multiple anomalous entities detected moving towards populated areas. Evacuation protocols may be necessary.
Field intelligence: Unknown energy signature registered near the center. All teams maintain safe distance.
Status update: Communication with northern sectors restored. Casualty reports being compiled.
Attention bar patrons: Due to increased Zone activity, curfew is now in effect from 2200 to 0600 hours.
Notice: All weapons must be checked at the entrance. No exceptions. Management not responsible for confiscated items.
Warning: Do not discuss classified information in common areas. Loose lips cost lives.
Information: Fresh supplies arrived from the perimeter. Stock up while available.
Alert: Several stalkers reported missing in the industrial district. Exercise extreme caution if venturing there.

Local time.

You can buy medicines here as usual.
If someone has something you need or you want to trade something for something else from your stash, contact the bartender, but don't disturb him with trifles. (The "Help" button is for information only, but it has the location of everything you need.)
Best regards

Attention.

If you have something interesting or expensive to sell, please contact the administrator, and he will find you the right buyer at a better price. Don't waste time on bargaining? Serious business - serious prices.
Baron

I have found a wonderful place,
Where money flows like a river.
Run from here - find adventure,
Stay with me - find death.

Anonymous

Information

Who sells AK-74 parts here for good prices? I need a barrel, stock and receiver. And something for the trigger mechanism too. I don't have much money, but I have good food. If anyone has something and doesn't mind trading, contact me through the bartender.
Vetka Shooter

Attention.

I am organizing a stalker group for artifact hunting. Experienced and novice stalkers welcome, as long as they follow safety protocols and aren't afraid to get their hands dirty. I'm not looking for lazy people or cowards. Only serious people, and most importantly, those who don't panic, don't abandon their teammates.
Experienced Leader

Attention.

I need someone to understand why the road to our base became dangerous, why people disappear there, why strange sounds are heard, and we can't get through, even though we used to travel through it regularly. I need someone experienced who knows the Zone well, who understands what might be causing the anomalies there, and who can find a way to make the road passable again, if that's possible.
Base Leader

For Sale.

Good protective suit - almost new condition. Expensive, of course. But if you value your own life, reconsider - it's priceless.
Turner

Attention.

I need an experienced artifact hunter. Both for sale and for hire - serious proposals only. Experience with dangerous anomalies required, as well as knowledge of safe extraction and handling protocols - no amateurs. High rewards for good work, good pay.
Artifact Dealer and Collector.

Stalkers!

I'm organizing a raid into the Zone!
If you have enough combat experience, good weapons and real desire to participate in a serious operation where real money is involved, but if you are not ready to risk life and put all your skills into the fight, sacrificing comfort, - contact me immediately and register for "duty"!
Operation Commander

If you want to buy cheap junk,
Then know for sure that it's garbage!
Better to save up for quality goods,
Than to curse all your life!

Anonymous

Attention!

Let me remind you about the "Debt" faction, which operates in our Zone with a definite ideological program and organization. We are not criminals or marauders. However, I want to clarify the situation for those "debtor" stalkers who think that "Debt" is just another gang or consider "Debt" members as enemies, and also to explain to everyone the essence of our organization, which is based on the most moral principles (ideological) and the strictest military discipline. We are the most disciplined military organization in the Zone.
Commander of the Debt

Information.

I need medical aid and first aid supplies for serious injuries, and I also need painkillers - contact me, as long as the goods are real. (Prices can be negotiated individually. Payment in cash, goods, or information services.)
Medic

Hello, colleagues.

I've been living in the Zone for a long time, but I'm new here. This is so, just in case someone here remembers me from the old places or knows me from somewhere - greetings. Friends are friends. I don't deal with enemies, period. Business is business.
Vova Stalker

For Sale.

Selling everything for scrap metal. Cheap but not broken, everything works. Contact me personally, friends. I'm having a closing sale!

Or maybe someone needs a partner, friends. I have everything for survival... Any suggestions?

Information

I need someone who can deliver medicines - serious money involved. Significant payment required, but there will be good profit from us - contact me immediately.
Medical Supplier

Information.

I need experienced mechanics for weapon maintenance and repair. Urgent.
Weapons Specialist

Cleared Zone!

Company "Black List". If anyone is interested in this and wants to get real money working for our "agency", if you have enough skills and experience, and have everything you need to work efficiently in our team - we need people. I won't describe all our activities here, but 100 rubles per day guaranteed.
Operation Manager

For Sale!

I'm selling military equipment and gear at low prices, everything works. We are not "profiteers" or anything. I've had this stuff for 2 years now, time to sell and get something new. As they say, we're moving on - new times.
Militarist

Selling alcohol - don't drink too much,
Buying weapons - prepare for war.
Don't get involved in politics, better stay quiet
And maybe you'll come home from the Zone alive.

Anonymous

Attention.

I have some good technical equipment for sale, fully functional computers, electronics, instruments. However, I only sell it to serious buyers for serious money.
Engineer

For Sale.

Good weapons and equipment available, contact me, everything works. I give guarantees and provide maintenance. Full package at fair prices.
Dealer with good weapon experience

For Sale.

I have two good detectors, both working, including a night-vision device. Need to sell them quickly, as I need the money. However, if anyone is interested - serious money only. Contact me personally, we can negotiate.
Electronics Specialist

Attention! If you don't have enough combat experience, then I don't need you as help. I work alone and in a team, but only with professionals. I prefer to know that I can trust the person and that they understand what it means to work in the Zone, and can handle the complexities, dangers and all that the Zone brings, you understand.\nExperienced Stalker

Information

Looking for partners for Zone expeditions. Experience required, weapons necessary. I provide maps, you provide skills. Split profits equally.
Expedition Organizer

For Sale.

Unique artifacts, rare finds from the deep Zone. High prices but genuine quality. No fakes, everything personally verified.
Artifact Collector

Notice.

Bar closing early tonight due to increased anomalous activity. All patrons must vacate by 2100 hours. Stay safe out there.
Management

...How did I end up in this place, but no... Our unit received orders: establish contact with research base! Gather intel and complete our mission - survive and return! Everyone scattered, everyone disappeared!
Went to the marked location, which should have coordinates for the bunker, but found only empty concrete walls. I already despaired and was ready to leave empty-handed. But I noticed, and now I understand, that apparently, to open the passage you need to enter some sort of security code, which I just can't figure out? But that's obvious, and I have no other choice.

But what disturbs me most is this feeling of being watched, the sensation that someone is near, that there are others. Something strange, some distant sounds? Strange radio interference? Several anomalous readings appear on the scanner, but we haven't encountered them before, they're not familiar... even somewhat frightening.

Something else, apparently, is not right with the electromagnetic field here either... Even if I find the code, the problem is that my radio doesn't work properly! And I noticed that communications and navigation systems are failing in unexpected ways, and this is not... Attention: after activating security systems - contact base immediately via "Alpha" channel, "Bravo" - emergency! This is in any case, mind you, so that rescue teams can reach us, covering the rear... Oh, brothers. This mission has become far more difficult than we expected at headquarters, but it seems that I found something... interesting enough to make it worthwhile... That's for sure.

And that fact that I have a signal, but some kind of strange... But when I compare with previously recorded radiation levels, I understand that something is clearly wrong here?? Yes, if readings are true and I'm not imagining things, then something big happened. And I doubt I can handle this situation alone... But there's no choice but to proceed with the mission parameters. Most important is that I know where I'm going, what to expect on arrival, so that it doesn't take me by surprise. Better prepare myself for serious obstacles. All that matters now is getting out alive, but I doubt that everything will go smoothly from here. "S..." signal disappeared and went silent. And so I continue this log in an unknown place and at unknown time, since I no longer know where I am, and even worse, that this place keeps changing...
